articles.author: Csongor Körömi, Jacopo Barigazzi
articles.title: EU Commission presents defense plan to protect ‘every’ centimeter of Europe - politico.eu
articles.description: The EU executive wants to coordinate efforts by member countries to speed up defense preparations.
articles.content: The Commission outlined four flagship projects in the roadmap, as well as boosting the bloc's military industrial complex while continuing to support Ukraine, which is considered an integral part of … [+1275 chars]
